doc.title: Tung Lok Signatures: Its the season for Hairy Crabs!
doc.text: It/PRP is/VBZ no/RB wonder/VB that/IN Hairy/JJ Crabs/NNS are/VBP a/DT delicacy/NN in/IN China/NNP ./. If/IN these/DT furry/JJ little/JJ creatures/NNS where/WRB found/VBN in/IN the/DT West/NN ,/, they/PRP would/MD simply/RB treat/VB them/PRP as/IN pests/NN because/IN they/PRP are/VBP so/RB difficult/JJ to/TO eat/VB ./. If/IN you/PRP are/VBP the/DT type/NN who/WP do/VBP n't/RB like/VB to/TO eat/VB crabs/NN because/IN you/PRP find/VBP it/PRP difficult/JJ to/TO extract/VB the/DT meat/NN from/IN them/PRP ,/, then/RB this/DT hairy/JJ little/JJ bugger/NN will/MD drive/VB you/PRP up/VB the/DT wall/NN ./. But/CC for/IN a/DT culture/NN who/WP love/VB to/TO nibble/VB on/IN fish/NN heads/NN and/CC sit/VB around/IN cracking/NNP Melon/NNP Seeds/NNP with/IN their/PRP$ teeth/NN ,/, these/DT Hairy/JJ Crabs/NNS are/VBP like/IN Manna/NN from/IN Heaven/NN ./.
